user_query: I'm organizing a company event and I need to verify the passports of all attendees. Can you help me fetch the verification results using the request ID 68bbb910-da9b-4d8a-9a1d-4bd878b19846? Additionally, please provide me with some work examples from our Portfolio API.

TaskList.description: Fetch the passport verification results using the provided request ID.
Retrieve work examples from the Portfolio API.
